title: The Same Brand of Pervert
description:
Gretchen of Raleigh's Mouth of the South kinky storytelling show shares a tale about spanking and surprises.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Time Traveling Toaster, Kevin Allison, Gretchen, Wake! Owl)
